item.title: 👍💵Jodie Alberts - Bellevue Chamber of Commerce
item.description: Jodie Alberts signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Bellevue Chamber of Commerce. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎💵Michael Shaw - Washington State Transit Association
item.description: Michael Shaw signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington State Transit Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Lynne Robinson - Mayor, City of Bellevue
item.description: Lynne Robinson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Mayor, City of Bellevue.

item.title: 👍💵Brooke Davies - TechNet
item.description: Brooke Davies signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent TechNet. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: ❓Kelli Refer - Move Redmond
item.description: Kelli Refer signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Move Redmond.

item.title: 👍Jeremy Burdett - TransWest
item.description: Jeremy Burdett signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent TransWest.

item.title: 👍Matt Jack - Bellevue Downtown Association
item.description: Matt Jack signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Bellevue Downtown Association.

item.title: 👍Kevin Wallace - Wallace Properties, Inc.
item.description: Kevin Wallace signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Wallace Properties, Inc..
